subproject.description:
1. New Strategies, policies and guidelines on biodiversity conservation at both national and provincial level respectively are approved and published by 2009.
2. CBDSC and its secretariat in SEPA are strengthened with improved institutional setup by 2009 so as to supervise all biodiversity programs in China.
3. Biodiversity conservation is integrated into key relevant policies and into some sectoral development plans at both national and provincial level by 2009.
4. The public (in representative areas, including field projects) has an increased understanding of the concept of biodiversity by 2009. 
5. Senior national and provincial (in field project areas) decision makers in relevant sectors routinely consider biodiversity in their decisions by 2010.
6. A series of innovative methods for biodiversity management are tested in selected ecosystems and disseminated by 2010.
7. Monitoring systems in field project areas can regularly indicate impact on ecosystems, key species and other biodiversity indices by 2010
8. Nineteen biodiversity field projects at provincial and local levels representing successful international and national partnerships have been implemented according to Guidelines and Grant Agreement.
subproject.gender code: Some contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: EU China Biodiversity

subproject.description:
Biodiversity considerations integrated into the One Centre Two Wings Strategy.
Sub1: Development and improvement of relevant policies and their implementation so as to mainstream biodiversity conservation and sustainable use into the daily work of government agencies at all levels, thereby strengthening their efforts to curb the loss of biodiversity.
Sub 2: The creation of mechanisms and an enabling environment so that different sectors involved in decision-making, planning, land management, information collection and processing, civil society and industry work together effectively to address threats to biodiversity conservation. By these means the government and the public will be able to respond properly and promptly to new and urgent problems of biodiversity conservation.
Sub 3: Biodiversity Conservation and sustainable use in the demonstration areas will be greatly improved.

subproject.title: Mainstream BDC in Chongqing
